column1: The province of East Java in Indonesia is divided into 29 kabupaten (or regencies) and 9 kotamadya (or cities); these in turn are divided administratively into districts
column3: of which there were 666 in 2020.	These comprise 8
column4: 501 administrative villages (kelurahan in urban areas and desa in rural areas).
